briefTitle: Study to Compare U0267 Against Vehicle in Subjects With Plaque-type Psoriasis One of Two Phase 3 Studies
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Phase 3 Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Emulsion Formulation U0267, Versus Vehicle in Subjects With Plaque-type Psoriasis
summary: The purpose of the study is to demonstrate the safety and efficacy of U0267 in subjects with plaque-type psoriasis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Treatment Success, Assessed Per the Investigator's Static Global Assessment (ISGA)
